get.summary: Get Reservation schedule in a month (with parameter year and month)
get.description: Get Reservation schedule in a month (with parameter year and month)

put.description: Only could cancel if booking_status = payment or waiting_approval, outside that would be rejected

put.summary: Change condition is_open_member status of a reservation by Host
put.description: Beside host cannot change condition of a reservation. Only approved reservation can open member

parameters.name: is_open_member
parameters.description: fill with 1 to change to True, 0 to False

put.summary: Change condition is_public status of a reservation by Host
put.description: Beside host cannot change condition of a reservation. Only approved reservation can be public reservation

parameters.name: is_public
parameters.description: fill with 1 to change to True, 0 to False

get.summary: Get Public Reservation to join with
get.description: With filter sport_kind, mabar_type, and sort_by distance or playing_date

parameters.name: geo_coordinate
parameters.description: Current device's location coordinate, you could fill with blank

parameters.name: sport_kind_id
parameters.description: sport_kind_id can gotten with sport_kind routes. you could fill with 'all' if doesn't need this filter

get.summary: Get Player's own Reservation
get.description: Get all reservation that player has ever created with filter booking_status

parameters.name: booking_status
parameters.description: payment / waiting_approval / approved / rejected / cancelled / all

get.summary: Get Joined Reservation
get.description: Get Reservation that player has been joined

parameters.name: sport_kind_id
parameters.description: sport_kind_id can gotten by sport_kinds route (or fill with 'all' if you don't want to use this filter)

get.summary: Get Reservation in all venue that he managed based on booking status
get.description: Get Reservation in all venue that he managed based on booking status

parameters.name: booking_status
parameters.description: option: payment, waiting_approval, approved, rejected, cancelled, all

get.summary: Get Reservation in specific venue that he managed based on booking status
get.description: Get Reservation in specific venue that he managed based on booking status

parameters.name: booking_status
parameters.description: option: payment, waiting_approval, approved, rejected, cancelled, all

get.summary: Get Detailed Reservation based on id
get.description: Get Detailed Reservation based on id

requestBody.description: option status: waiting_approval, approved, rejected, cancelled

get.summary: Check in a field is there any ongoing reservation or not
get.description: Check by field_id, date, and time. Device/ESP would check every round hour (XX:00:00) and display host or mabar name in panel fields

get.summary: Unlock venue door by venue_id and reservation_id that scanned from QR Code
get.description: if venue, reservation, schedule date, arrival time with time open/close venue doesn't match, access to unlock not granted

post.description: Join from a public reservation exploration

post.summary: Invite Player to reservation by Host
post.description: Host could invite directly even is_open_member and is_public is False

get.summary: Get list of players in a reservation
Get details of reservation

post.summary: Post and Get a reservation QR
post.description: Create new QR in cloud if never requested, and get a url to qr code. This QR is for door unlocking system
